Description.Text: Conveniently situated in the San Telmo neighbourhood, one of the most picturesque areas of Buenos Aires, the stylish aparthotel Defensa Suites by Temporary Apartments enjoys a great location in the heart of the city, surrounded by numerous restaurants, cafÃ©s and antique stores. Attractions such as Parque Lezama, Plaza Dorrego with its crafts market, Calle Defensa with its famous flea market and the Museum of Modern Art are just a few steps away. Puerto Madero, Plaza de Mayo and the Casa Rosada can be reached within a short stroll. The minimalist, contemporary style apartments range from studios to two-bedroom apartments and feature air-conditioning, central heating, complete kitchenette as well as complimentary wireless internet connection. In addition, the hotel offers a garden, a sun deck with outdoor pool as well as a gym. An ideal choice for families and groups of friends wishing to discover this exciting city.
